
# This file was generated by the build system used internally in the Yandex monorepo.
# Only simple modifications are allowed (adding source-files to targets, adding simple properties
# like target_include_directories). These modifications will be ported to original
# ya.make files by maintainers. Any complex modifications which can't be ported back to the
# original buildsystem will not be accepted.


get_built_tool_path(
  TOOL_protoc_bin
  TOOL_protoc_dependency
  contrib/tools/protoc/bin
  protoc
)
get_built_tool_path(
  TOOL_cpp_styleguide_bin
  TOOL_cpp_styleguide_dependency
  contrib/tools/protoc/plugins/cpp_styleguide
  cpp_styleguide
)

add_library(yt-ytlib-discovery_client)
target_compile_options(yt-ytlib-discovery_client PRIVATE
  -Wdeprecated-this-capture
)
target_include_directories(yt-ytlib-discovery_client PUBLIC
  ${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/ytsaurus/yt
)
target_link_libraries(yt-ytlib-discovery_client PUBLIC
  contrib-libs-linux-headers
  #contrib-libs-cxxsupp
  yutil
  contrib-libs-protobuf
  yt-yt-core
  yt-yt-client
)
target_proto_messages(yt-ytlib-discovery_client PRIVATE
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/yt/yt/ytlib/discovery_client/proto/discovery_client_service.proto
)
target_sources(yt-ytlib-discovery_client PRIVATE
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/yt/yt/ytlib/discovery_client/config.cpp
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/yt/yt/ytlib/discovery_client/discovery_client.cpp
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/yt/yt/ytlib/discovery_client/helpers.cpp
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/yt/yt/ytlib/discovery_client/member_client.cpp
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/yt/yt/ytlib/discovery_client/public.cpp
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/yt/yt/ytlib/discovery_client/request_session.cpp
)
target_proto_addincls(yt-ytlib-discovery_client
  ./yt
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/yt
  ${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/ytsaurus
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/yt
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/contrib/libs/protobuf/src
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/yt
  ${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/ytsaurus
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/contrib/libs/protobuf/src
)
target_proto_outs(yt-ytlib-discovery_client
  --cpp_out=${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/ytsaurus/yt
  --cpp_styleguide_out=${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/ytsaurus/yt
)
